What is Travel Buddy?: Travel Buddy is a companion app to help plan your next vacation! It acts as a travel log, giving you the ability to record your latest trips and remember some of your favorite memories. When its time to plan your next trip, Travel Buddy gives suggestions of new places to explore!
How does it work?: Travel Buddy analyzes your travel habits and gives you suggestions based on other users, giving you new destinations that we know you'll love!
